description:
Our firm was formed in May, 1982, by Ronald R. Weems with one partner to provide general legal services in banking, real estate, tax and estate planning areas. Originally located in downtown Shreveport, Louisiana, in 1983 the firm relocated to 912 Kings Highway in Shreveport's historic Highland District. Since that time, the firm has evolved into a full-service law firm with attorneys focusing in business, real estate, banking, tax and estate planning, domestic, personal injury, commercial litigation and defense litigation.

Our attorneys are well-respected practitioners who strive to make a positive difference for our clients. We realize that identifying and obtaining legal counsel is one of the most crucial decisions a client must make. We believe that it is of paramount importance to develop and maintain a close-working relationship with our clients. Our firm has benefited from high rate of client retention by providing the highest quality service at reasonable rates and maintaining a client oriented practice.

Our attorneys are leaders in developing new techniques and approaches to legal problem solving and client service as well as committed to providing prompt, cost-effective solutions to legal problems, consistent with the highest standards of professional and ethical conduct. To that end, our attorneys and support staff utilize the latest in computerized equipment and services, including local area networks with e-mail, computerized research, litigation support software and hardware as well as Internet research.

From its inception, Weems, Schimpf, Haines, Shemwell & Moore (APLC) has been committed to changing and diversifying to better meet the needs of our clients. Our firm's full-service approach to legal representation has fostered the talents of our individual attorneys and allowed us to maintain our commitment to high quality, cost-effective legal services.
